title: Moving On
description: Friends since grade school, in love since high school, Rusty and Sean have grown up together. When Sean graduates from college, he is offered his dream job, thousands of miles away from home. Two months apart while Sean trains for his new career has stirred all kinds of insecurities in Rusty. When they are finally reunited, Sean seemsâ€”different. Or is it Rusty who has changed? When life experiences challenge their love and commitment, Sean and Rusty must decide. Will they move on with lives together or apart?
author: Chris   Cox
